p: It can be also seen from Tables 3 and 4 that the predictive models for both the sectors fit the data remarkably well, as evidenced by the substantially high R 2 values of 96% for the residential sector and 99% for the commercial sector. The modelsâ€™ goodness-of-fit, together with their uncertainty bounds are visualized for the residential and commercial sectors in Figs 6 and 7.
